channel.title: [Class Suggestion]The Convincer (BD Investigative)/ The Manipulator (Unseen Offensive)
channel.description:
Made with the help of the lovely Plex.
[color=ligblue] **The Convicier**[/color] (Blue Dragon Investigator)
**Night Ability: Tea Vist** Talk to a person and loosen their lips and getting a letter of thier class.-Infinite Uses
**Night Ability 2: Drugged Tea** Get two possible factions from a person. One of which will be wrong.-2 uses
*See the Unseen and Cult destroyed along with any neutrals that wish to harm you*
[color=purple]**The Manipulator**[/color] (Unseen Offensive)
**Day Ability:** You can control somebody's vote today- 2 use
**Night Ability:Twist Mind** You will control who someone uses their action on. It will say that they were occupied. All occupy immune people will be immune to it once or twice.
*You win with the Unseen*
I hope you guys like it. Also feedback welcome. Don't be a prick and say "Not gud, 0/10" without any reason. Change Log 8/12/17-Changed Drugged tea

item.title: [Class Suggestion]The Convincer (BD Investigative)/ The Manipulator (Unseen Offensive)
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
Ami:

Talk to a person and loosen their lips and getting a letter of thier class.-Infinite Uses

this is incredibly weak
for example, there are 26 classes with an “E” in their name, 25 with an “R” and 22 with an “S”, and every letter is used in at least 3 classes, except one, which is Z and only appears once (I didn’t include any aftermath classes)

Ami:

Get two possible factions from a person. One of which will be wrong.-2 uses

this is incredibly weak, even if you get “Unseen/Neutral” they still could be a helpful neutral like a Merc or a neutral you want to avoid executing like a Fool

Read full topic
item.source: [Class Suggestion]The Convincer (BD Investigative)/ The Manipulator (Unseen Offensive)

item.title: [Class Suggestion]The Convincer (BD Investigative)/ The Manipulator (Unseen Offensive)
item.dc:creator: Ashe
item.description:
I think it could just give two factions, one of which is correct. That way throughout the game it gets more useful, for example, you get Cult and Neutral, but you now know it’s an Unseen game, so they are confirmed neutral.

Read full topic
item.source: [Class Suggestion]The Convincer (BD Investigative)/ The Manipulator (Unseen Offensive)

item.title: [Class Suggestion]The Convincer (BD Investigative)/ The Manipulator (Unseen Offensive)
item.dc:creator: Ami
item.description:
Eh. What do you think could replace it. I for one have no clue.

Read full topic
item.source: [Class Suggestion]The Convincer (BD Investigative)/ The Manipulator (Unseen Offensive)

item.title: [Class Suggestion]The Convincer (BD Investigative)/ The Manipulator (Unseen Offensive)
item.dc:creator: Ashe
item.description:
Night Ability 2: Drugged Tea
Get two random letters of somebody’s alignment, but it could be wrong

Wait, so you only get two letters of their alignment, but it could very well be wrong?
For example, you check them and get “u” and “n”. It could be Unseen, or Neutral, but it could also be anything? Seems fairly useless.

Read full topic
item.source: [Class Suggestion]The Convincer (BD Investigative)/ The Manipulator (Unseen Offensive)
